common.tool_in_development_desc: This tool is currently under development.
common.tool_coming_soon: This tool will be available soon.
common.want_notification: If you want to be notified when development is complete
common.related_tool_desc: This is a useful tool related to this tool.

base64.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64.description: Encode or decode text and files to/from Base64. URL-safe Base64 is also supported
base64.file_read_error: An error occurred while reading the file.
base64.base64_input_placeholder: Enter Base64 string or Data URI

usage.item2: Convert Base64 string to original text.
usage.item3: Use the converted result as a new input.
usage.item4: Copy the content with the button in the upper right corner of each text area.
usage.file1: Select or drag a file to convert it to Base64.
usage.file2: You can easily upload files using drag and drop.
usage.file3: Results are generated in Data URI format (data:mime;base64,...).
usage.decode1: Enter Base64 string or Data URI to convert to file.
usage.decode2: Download the converted file using the download button.
usage.decode3: Supports both Data URI format and plain Base64 strings.
usage.urlsafe1: URL-safe Base64 can be safely used in URLs.
usage.urlsafe2: Replaces + and / with - and _, and removes padding (=).

json_formatter.title: JSON Pretty Formatter
json_formatter.description: Format or minify JSON strings to be readable.
json_formatter.output_placeholder: Formatted JSON will be displayed here
json_formatter.parse_error_message: Invalid JSON format. Please check the JSON syntax.

usage.item1_desc: When you enter JSON, it is automatically formatted to be readable.
usage.item2_desc: You can choose 2 or 4 space indentation.
usage.item3_desc: You can compress the formatted JSON into one line.
usage.item4_desc: You can copy the formatted result to the clipboard with the button in the upper right corner.
usage.item5_desc: An error message is displayed for invalid JSON format.

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.description: Convert text, URLs, email, phone numbers, SMS, and WiFi information into QR codes
qrcode.text_placeholder: Enter text to convert to QR code
qrcode.no_preview: Enter content to generate QR code
qrcode.generation_error: Error occurred while generating QR code

usage.item1: Select the desired QR code type
usage.item3: Adjust size, colors, and error correction level
usage.item4: Copy or download the generated QR code

url_encoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
url_encoder.description: Encode text to URL-safe format or decode encoded URLs to original text
url_encoder.encode_error: An error occurred while encoding URL
url_encoder.decode_error: An error occurred while decoding URL

usage.item2: Convert encoded URL to original text
usage.item3: Use the converted result as a new input
usage.item4: Copy content with the button in the upper right corner of each text area
usage.item5_desc: Provides a preview when the decoded result is a valid URL

unit_converter.name: Unit Converter
unit_converter.description: Convert various units such as length, weight, temperature, etc.

json_formatter.name: JSON Formatter
json_formatter.description: Format and minify JSON data beautifully.

base64_converter.name: Base64 Converter
base64_converter.description: Convert text and Base64 encoding mutually.

timestamp_converter.name: Timestamp Converter
timestamp_converter.description: Convert Unix timestamps and dates mutually.

cron_parser.name: Cron Parser
cron_parser.description: Parse Cron expressions and check the next execution time.

color_converter.name: Color Converter
color_converter.description: Convert various color formats such as HEX, RGB, HSL, etc.

text_case_converter.name: Text Case Converter
text_case_converter.description: Convert text cases such as uppercase, lowercase, camelCase, etc.

qr_code_generator.name: QR Code Generator
qr_code_generator.description: Convert text, URLs, email, WiFi information, etc. into QR codes.

string_diff.name: String Diff
string_diff.description: Visually compare and highlight differences between two texts.

slack_emoji_generator.name: Slack Emoji Generator
slack_emoji_generator.description: Generate Slack emojis from text with customizable fonts, colors, and alignment.

ascii_art_generator.name: ASCII Art Generator
ascii_art_generator.description: Convert images to ASCII art with various character sets and customizable settings.

string_diff.title: String Diff (Text Comparison)
string_diff.description: Visually compare and highlight differences between two texts. Support character, word, and line-level comparison
string_diff.text_a_placeholder: Enter the first text to compare
string_diff.text_b_placeholder: Enter the second text to compare
string_diff.no_diff: Enter text to see the differences

usage.item1: Enter texts to compare in both text areas
usage.item2: Choose comparison method from character, word, or line level
usage.item3: Use options like ignore whitespace and ignore case
usage.item4: Green indicates added parts, red indicates removed parts
usage.item5: Use the arrow button to swap the position of the two texts

slack_emoji.title: Slack Emoji Generator
slack_emoji.description: Generate Slack emojis from text. Set font, colors, alignment and download as image
slack_emoji.how_to_use_slack: How to use emojis in Slack
slack_emoji.instruction_1: Go to Workspace Settings > Emoji Management menu
slack_emoji.tip_2: Use good contrast color combinations for better readability
slack_emoji.tip_3: Emoji names can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

usage.item1: Enter text and set your desired style settings
usage.item2: Preview updates in real-time as you make changes
usage.item3: Download the generated image and upload to Slack
usage.item4: Use the copy button to check the Slack upload guide

ascii_art.title: ASCII Art Generator
ascii_art.description: Convert images to ASCII art with various character sets and settings to create the text art style you want
ascii_art.supported_formats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP (max 10MB)
ascii_art.custom_characters_hint: Enter characters from bright to dark order
ascii_art.no_result: Upload an image to see ASCII art here
ascii_art.invalid_file_type: Only image files can be uploaded.
ascii_art.file_too_large: File size must be 10MB or less.
ascii_art.processing_error: An error occurred while processing the image.

usage.item1: Upload an image and it will be automatically converted to ASCII art
usage.item2: Adjust width to set output size (20-200 characters)
usage.item3: Choose different character sets to create your desired style
usage.item4: Adjust contrast to enhance or soften the brightness effects
usage.item5: Copy the result or download it as a text file

ascii_art.title: ASCII Art Generator
ascii_art.description: Convert images to ASCII characters to create text art
ascii_art.drag_and_drop: Drag an image here to upload
ascii_art.or_click_to_browse: or click to select a file
